
    SELECT 
        p.Id AS [AnswerId],
        p.ParentId AS [QuestionId],
        p.CreationDate AS [AnswerCreationDate],
        p.Score AS [AnswerScore],
        p.Body AS [AnswerBody],
        p.OwnerUserId AS [AnswerAuthorId],
        p.OwnerDisplayName AS [AnswerAuthorName]
    FROM 
        Posts p
    WHERE 
        p.PostTypeId = 2  -- Answer posts
        AND p.ParentId IN (57639507,57806624,57808152,57889719,58643905,59060710,59240304,59474920,59566458,60157702,60176044,60840243,60881927,61048334,61096521,61188927,61268184,61289322,61823476,61954361,61979870,62591569,62784756,62908594,63159962,63226588,63288356,63672189,63676119,63691962,63803136,64078671,64169578,64553739,64721253,64727916,64745031,64883366,65205928,65461758,65882254,66308908,66335124,66918575,68245374,68692017,68767043,68938010,68978306,69177488,69396004,69917498,70130613,70278241,70907287,71030111,71179099,71525489,71885354,72017244,72353130,72375995,72646802,73018888,73080088,73128465,73327325,73417515,73483825,73497571,73626276,73798925,73853178,74112918,74114983,74151972,74266971,74550179,75162480,75233027,75290662,75337206,75399577,75438906,75468298,75478713,75489109,75720649,75733616,75835498,76168022,76183721,76202754,76209563,76235374,76259462,76262960,76266314,76279262,76312191,76431545,76512235,76611427,76681761,76708129,76739418,76746551,76749213,76797766,76938952,76952023,77007269,77009521,77099483,77255765,77308573,77355720,77395114,77431693,77469265,77519735)
    ORDER BY 
        p.ParentId, p.CreationDate;
